name: the wall (itch)
description:
***BEST VIEWED FULL-SCREEN***

--

it really really really sucks to be an artist in programming spaces. it also really really really sucks to be a programmer in art spaces. let's just ditch the condescending bullshit and learn to appreciate that we're two halves of a beautiful whole, and we can all learn from each other.

"the wall" is a short interactive fiction art piece written and programmed by myself (an artist), with ascii art illustrations by heather robertson (a programmer). if we can do it, so can you!

--

free/pwyw to play in browser but a downloadable .zip is $2-- please consider sending a couple bucks my way since i'm extremely poor and wanna keep making stuff for y'all <3
